TopicTitle: We apear on hack a day!

Articles.Content:
Hack a day posted an article about KSP!

[http://hackaday.com/2012/05/14/mapping-the-surface-of-a-video-game-moon/](http://hackaday.com/2012/05/14/mapping-the-surface-of-a-video-game-moon/)
Publicity FTW! Great to see the game prosper. Who knew it would be this successful?

> 
> Ooh, a 3D printed Mun.

Now I just need to find a 3D printer

> 
> Now I just need to find a 3D printer

My favorite teacher just got one! \*score\*

OK, enough with the 'yay's already!

[mod]These posts are infringing the following rule:

> 
> **Section 3: Spam**
> ...
> A user shall not: Create a Post containing no real content, such as "+1!" or other single word responses.

[/mod]

All better now. Carry on. 8)

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Woops, guess I broke a rule.... :-[

In other news, cool! I hope it brings us some more users!

Congrats!

i actually thought people were hacking the game :-[
